1461510.name: Hellbound - Mayhem Pack
1461510.description:
Exclusive content from Hellbound, including:

  • Artbook: 100 page PDF with concept art, illustrations and development commentaries from art directors Fernando Muzzio and Viktor Ahmed
  • Soundtrack: 10 extended version songs from Hellbound, composed by David Levill. Including classic Ready to Die, Soul Breaker (ft. Christian Perucchi) and Hell & Gore (by Federico Ágreda "Zardonic"). Full tracklist:

    1. Ready To Die (03:04)
    2. The Meat Grinder (04:14)
    3. Imminent Extinction (03:28)
    4. Sacred Feast (03:37)
    5. Death March (03:49)
    6. Back To War (03:37)
    7. Soul Breaker (ft. Christian Perucchi) (03:51)
    8. The Killing Machine (03:54)
    9. Hell & Gore (Zardonic) (04:08)
    10. Echoes Of Revenge (04:06)
1461510.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
